description: Produces a comprehensive single-incident export for post-incident review or compliance submission. Returns the full incident record including status, severity, timing metrics, agent attribution, investigation findings, remediation plan, and verification results.

configuration.query: FROM vigil-incidents | WHERE incident_id == ?incident_id | KEEP incident_id, status, severity, incident_type, priority_score, created_at, resolved_at, total_duration_seconds, ttd_seconds, tti_seconds, ttr_seconds, ttv_seconds, agents_involved, reflection_count, resolution_type, alert_ids, affected_assets, investigation, remediation_plan, verification_results
